payload.message: Daily routine. Call yahoo_morning_briefing, then yahoo_auto_lineup. Execute any priority-1 action items (injured starters, pending trades). Report actions taken in 2-3 sentences.

New matchup week. Call yahoo_league_landscape for standings context, then yahoo_matchup_strategy for this week's opponent. Report: your opponent, category targets/concedes, top 2 recommended actions. Keep under 200 words.
Midweek waiver wire check. Call yahoo_waiver_recommendations. If any recommendation has a strong category improvement, execute the top add/drop. Report what you found and any actions taken.
Weekend roster audit. Call yahoo_roster_health_check. Report any critical or warning issues found. If there are healthy players stuck on IL, flag them for activation.
